question.questionText: Kate said: "An object has to move to produce sound." Do you agree with her? Why or why not?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Agree. Vibrations are movements. Vibrations produce sound.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Yes I do agree because there are some that have to shake.
No! Because a TV makes sound and does not move.
I agree with Kate because a vibration has to move And in order for sound to be made it needs to vibrate.
I agree because it has to vibrate and vibrating is moving.
